Package frogger.model.info

Class Life

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.model.info.Life
  • public class Life
extends java.lang.Object

    Life

    A Life is a class recording life for one game.

    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Tianyi GAO

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int current
      current value of this life.
      private int max
      maximum value of life for whole game.
      private int start
      Initial value of life.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Life()
      Creates a new default Life for new game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void gain()
      Increase value of current life by 1, but not bigger than maximum.
      int getCurrent()
      Getter for current.
      void lose()
      Decrease value of current life by 1.
